question: A friend is thinking about applying for the same course/subject that you did at university. He/She has asked for your advice. Give details of the course you took at the university, explain why you recommend the university, and give some advice about how to apply.
text: I'm glad to hear from you again. I would also like to thank you for trusting me with such an important matter. So, here are some

As you know, I earned my bachelor's degree from Taichung Medical University. The medicine program you're asking about is vast and encompassing. In addition, since it includes not only biomedical and microbiology courses but also gross anatomy in the curriculum, it'll be inevitable for you to do some invasive procedures.

Of course, the best part of the university is that it has been cooperating with a few medical centres so that every student is able to participate in the internship, which could be very beneficial to your future career. Moreover, all the professors are experienced and will be willing to support you throughout your study progress,

To apply for the program, I would suggest that you visit the official website right away. If you run into any problems, don't hesitate to make a phone call to the admission officers. They will help you check the documents you need for the application.
